channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023090649
item.description:
Report X-2023090649

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: MAGNA
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered during sort and damage scan was put on package for it to be notified for hazmat processing. DescribePack: Loose lid parts of material are on top of item and spilled inside packaging. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Package was contained in red hazard bin with liner.
